mapper.insert: insert into tb_member (member_id, pw, name, nickname, gender, jumin, phone, age, email, photo) values (#{member_id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{gender}, #{jumin}, #{phone}, #{age}, #{email}, #{photo})
mapper.update: update tb_member set password = #{password} where member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_member where member_id = #{member_id}
select * from tb_member where name = #{name} and jumin = #{jumin}
select * from tb_member where name = #{name} and jumin = #{jumin} and member_id = #{member_id}
select email from tb_member where member_id = #{member_id}
